author: Sarah Jenkins
content: The Gwangjang market tour was the highlight of our Seoul trip. Our guide knew every vendor and we tried things we never would have ordered ourselves!

author: Mark Thompson
content: The BBQ night was fantastic. Learning how to properly grill and the etiquette of drinking soju made us feel like true Seoulites. Highly recommend!

author: Elena Rodriguez
content: Everything was perfectly organized. The street food safari was a blast and we found amazing spots that aren't in any of our guidebooks.

author: James Chen
content: The cooking class exceeded all expectations. I can now make authentic bibimbap at home! The instructor was patient and so knowledgeable.

author: Marie Dubois
content: Great tour with lots of food! The bindaetteok was incredible. Only small note - wish we had a bit more time at each stop.

author: Tanaka Yuki
content: Fresh sashimi straight from the market! The guide helped us negotiate prices and choose the best fish. An unforgettable experience.
